Unknown.translation: Just as a wife makes over many type of embellishments in order to attract her husband, but once in the embrace of her husband, she does not like even the necklace in her neck.

Unknown.translation: Just as an innocent child plays many types of games as a child, but as soon as he grows up, he forgets all his childhood preoccupations.
